biography: Anders, a familiar name at Vihti Golf Club, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While possessing a reserved demeanor, Anders is a fierce competitor on the course.
He has participated once in the Hector Trophée, showcasing his dedication to this esteemed tournament.
Though seemingly retired from the Hector Trophée circuit with no plans to participate in 2025, the world of golf knows that anything can happen.
